PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Jorge Macias - Software Developer in Backend, Frontend, and Desktop Applications.
ABOUT_ME: Soy un desarrollador de software con experiencia en desarrollo web: backend y frontend. También tengo experiencia en desarrollo de aplicaciones de escritorio en Windows.
He trabajado con una variedad de lenguajes de programación y frameworks, esto me ha permitido adaptarme a entornos de desarrollo facilemente, además de colaborar en equipo eficazmente.

LANGS.name: JavaScript
LANGS.description: I have learned this language to start my path as a web developer.

LANGS.name: TypeScript
LANGS.description: After learning JavaScript, I moved here to take advantage of the type system and avoid the problems associated with JavaScript.

LANGS.name: C#
LANGS.description: I learned it in university and have developed some applications that automate internal processes at my university.

LANGS.name: Python
LANGS.description: I have used Python for competitive programming in the last two years (2023-2024) in the ICPC of Mexico. Soon, I plan to use it for artificial intelligence projects.

LANGS.name: Lua
LANGS.description: I learned Lua by helping a friend improve code for a mod for The Binding of Isaac, leveraging its simplicity and efficiency for scripting and game development.

LANGS.name: PHP
LANGS.description: I have used PHP to develop web applications following the MVC pattern and using a template engine inspired by Laravel. This allowed me to structure and modularize code efficiently, improving project maintainability and organization.

LANGS.name: SQL / MySQL
LANGS.description: I use SQL and MySQL to manage databases in web applications, ensuring data integrity and optimizing queries to improve performance.

LANGS.name: Java
LANGS.description: I learned Java for imperative and object-oriented programming, with practices including basic GUI development using javax.swing.

FRAMEWORKS.name: React
FRAMEWORKS.description: I use React to build interactive and dynamic user interfaces in my web projects.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Node.js
FRAMEWORKS.description: I have used Node.js to build server-side applications, leveraging its efficiency and scalability.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Express
FRAMEWORKS.description: I use Express as a minimalist framework for Node.js, making it easier to create robust and efficient APIs.

FRAMEWORKS.name: WPF
FRAMEWORKS.description: I have developed desktop applications using WPF, leveraging its ability to create rich and fluid user interfaces in C#.

FRAMEWORKS.name: WinForms
FRAMEWORKS.description: I use WinForms to develop desktop applications in C#, due to its ease of use and rapid interface development.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Tailwind CSS
FRAMEWORKS.description: I use Tailwind CSS to design web applications with a highly customizable and utility-first approach, making it easy to create modern and responsive user interfaces.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Astro
FRAMEWORKS.description: I have used Astro to build static and dynamic websites using reusable components, combining the best of static and server-side development.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Bun
FRAMEWORKS.description: I use Bun to develop lightweight and efficient web applications, leveraging its minimalist approach and optimized performance.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Prisma
FRAMEWORKS.description: I have used Prisma as an ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) to efficiently interact with databases in backend projects, facilitating query management and data handling.

FRAMEWORKS.name: Next.js
FRAMEWORKS.description: I have used Next.js, a React framework, to build fast and scalable web applications with server-side rendering and static site generation.

OTHERS.name: GitHub
OTHERS.description: I use GitHub to store my personal projects and things I learn.

OTHERS.name: DigitalOcean
OTHERS.description: I have used DigitalOcean to develop and deploy a fullstack application as part of a university course.

OTHERS.name: GitHub Actions
OTHERS.description: I have used GitHub Actions in conjunction with DigitalOcean to deploy the aforementioned project.

OTHERS.name: Git
OTHERS.description: I use Git for version control in my projects, allowing me to efficiently manage code and collaborate with other developers.

OTHERS.name: Nginx
OTHERS.description: I have configured Nginx to manage access to the project's web page, improving traffic distribution and security.

OTHERS.name: Insomnia
OTHERS.description: I use Insomnia to test and document APIs, facilitating development and collaboration on web service-based projects.

OTHERS.name: Linux
OTHERS.description: I have used Linux to manage the DigitalOcean server, leveraging its stability and flexibility.

OTHERS.name: Visual Studio Code
OTHERS.description: I use Visual Studio Code as my primary code editor due to its flexibility, extensibility, and support for multiple languages.

OTHERS.name: Visual Studio
OTHERS.description: I use Visual Studio on Windows to develop applications in C#, leveraging its advanced development and debugging tools.

OTHERS.name: HTML5
OTHERS.description: I use HTML5 as a markup standard to structure and present content in web applications, integrating it with CSS and JavaScript to create interactive and modern user interfaces.

EXPERIENCES.description: As a frontend developer, my responsibilities included consuming REST APIs, attending daily meetings, maintaining a landing page, and collaborating with UX/UI designers.

PROJECTS.title: Minecraft-Map-To-Image
PROJECTS.description: Aplicación de escritorio que permite guardar como imagen mapas dentro de los mundos de Minecraft.
responsabilities: Diseño e implementación de la interfaz de usuario utilizando WPF.
Selección de colores y layout de la interfaz.
Desarrollo de funcionalidades de la aplicación en C#.
Gestión de dependencias del proyecto utilizando NuGet.
